trans-unit.source: Authenticates a security token.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenner en sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: The SecurityTokenAuthenticator class and the classes that derive from it authenticate security tokens.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenn sikkerhetstokener for SecurityTokenAuthenticator og klasser som er avledet fra den.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you would only derive a class directly from SecurityTokenAuthenticator when you create a custom security token.
trans-unit.target: Du vil vanligvis bare utledet en klasse direkte fra SecurityTokenAuthenticator når du oppretter en egendefinert sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: If you wanted to override the default authentication or authorization behaviors for built-in security tokens, derive from one of the classes that derive from SecurityTokenAuthenticator, such as <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre standard godkjenning eller godkjenning virkemåter for innebygde sikkerhetstokener avledes fra en av klassene som er avledet fra SecurityTokenAuthenticator, for eksempel <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator>

trans-unit.source: When you derive a class from SecurityTokenAuthenticator, override the following two methods: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateTokenCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Når du avledet en klasse fra SecurityTokenAuthenticator, overstyre disse metodene: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>og <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateTokenCore%2A>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateTokenCore%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateTokenCore%2A> method determines whether this security token authenticator can authenticate a specific security token.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateTokenCore%2A>metoden bestemmer om denne Sikkerhetstokengodkjenneren kan godkjenne en bestemt sikkerhetskode.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> method authenticates the security token and establishes a set of authorization policies for authorization.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>metoden godkjenner sikkerhetstokenet og oppretter et sett med godkjenning policyer for godkjenning.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The authorization policies map the claims found in the security token to claims required by the application.
trans-unit.target: Authorization-policyer tilordne krav i sikkerhetstokenet for krav som kreves av programmet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified security token can be validated by this security token authenticator.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den angitte sikkerhetskode kan valideres av denne Sikkerhetstokengodkjenneren.

trans-unit.source: The CanValidateToken method checks whether the token parameter is `null` and then calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateTokenCore%2A> method to determine whether this security token authenticator can authenticate the security token type for `token`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CanValidateToken kontrollerer om parameteren token `null` og kaller deretter den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateTokenCore%2A>metode for å finne ut om denne Sikkerhetstokengodkjenneren kan godkjenne sikkerhet tokentypen for `token`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to be validated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> godkjennes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when token can be validated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Når tokenet kan valideres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: token is .
trans-unit.target: tokenis .

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the specified security token can be validated by this security token authenticator.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den angitte sikkerhetskode kan valideres av denne Sikkerhetstokengodkjenneren når overstyres i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The CanValidateTokenCore method is called by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateToken%2A> method to determine whether this security token authenticator can authenticate the security token type for `token`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CanValidateTokenCore kalles av den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateToken%2A>metode for å finne ut om denne Sikkerhetstokengodkjenneren kan godkjenne sikkerhet tokentypen for `token`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: This does not authenticate the security token; that is performed by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateToken%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Dette godkjenner ikke sikkerhetstokenet; som utføres av den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateToken%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to be validated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> godkjennes.

trans-unit.source: when token can be validated; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Når token kan være godkjent; ellers, .

trans-unit.source: Authenticates the specified security token and returns the set of authorization policies for the security token.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenner angitte sikkerhetstokenet, og returnerer settet med godkjenning policyer for sikkerhetstokenet.

trans-unit.source: The ValidateToken method checks whether the `token` parameter is `null`, calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateToken%2A> method to determine if this security token authenticator can authenticate this security token, and then if it can, calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ValidateToken metoden kontrollerer om den `token` parameteren er `null`, kall av <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateToken%2A>metode for å finne ut om denne Sikkerhetstokengodkjenneren kan godkjenne denne sikkerhetskode, og hvis det er mulig, kaller deretter den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to be validated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> godkjennes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref> that contains the set of authorization policies in effect for this application.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> av typen <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"> </xref> som inneholder settet med godkjenning policyer som gjelder for dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: token is .
trans-unit.target: tokenis .

trans-unit.source: token cannot be authenticated by this security token authenticator -or- token is not authenticated.
trans-unit.target: tokenkan ikke godkjennes av denne Sikkerhetstokengodkjenneren - eller - token er ikke godkjent.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, authenticates the specified security token and returns the set of authorization policies for the security token.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, godkjenner angitte sikkerhetstokenet, og returnerer settet med godkjenning policyer for sikkerhetstokenet.

trans-unit.source: Override the ValidateTokenCore method to authenticate a specific security token type.
trans-unit.target: Overstyr ValidateTokenCore-metoden for å godkjenne en spesifikk sikkerhetsoppdatering tokentypen.

trans-unit.source: When the ValidateTokenCore method is overridden, follow these guidelines: - When the security token passed into the `token` parameter cannot be validated, throw the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Når metoden ValidateTokenCore overstyres, følger du retningslinjene: – når sikkerhetstokenet som ble sendt til den `token` parameteren kan ikke validere, Iverksett den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>unntak.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>

trans-unit.source: - When there are no authorization policies in effect for this application, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>.
trans-unit.target: -Når det finnes ingen godkjenning policyer som gjelder for dette programmet, returneres en tom <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>av typen <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: When `null` is returned by this method, [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] throws the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Når `null` returneres av denne metoden [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] oppstår det <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>unntak.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>

trans-unit.source: The ValidateTokenCore method is called by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateToken%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ValidateTokenCore kalles av den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateToken%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to be validated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> godkjennes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref> that contains the set of authorization policies in effect for this application.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> av typen <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"> </xref> som inneholder settet med godkjenning policyer som gjelder for dette programmet.
